original_text: People gave this news to Judah's royal family. They said, ‘The armies of Syria and Ephraim have joined together to attack you.’ When they heard this, Ahaz and his people were very afraid. They shook with fear, like trees in the forest shake in the wind.
korean_text: 어떤 사람이 다윗의 집에 알려 이르되 아람이 에브라임과 동맹하였다 하였으므로 왕의 마음과 그의 백성의 마음이 숲이 바람에 흔들림 같이 흔들렸더라

sentences.original_text: People gave this news to Judah's royal family.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 이 소식을 유다 왕가에게 전했다.

sentences.original_text: The armies of Syria and Ephraim have joined together
Ahaz and his people were very afraid.
like trees in the forest shake in the wind.
